page.title: 13POTTEN END-THE GREEN III.
page.content:
TODAY THE POND IS VERY PRETTY,WITH GROUPS OF LILLY PADS,A DUCK ISLAND AND TWO DUCK HOUSES,ALL OF WHICH ARE BEING USED BY MOORHENS AND DUCKS. THE REMAINDER OF THE GREEN IS OCCUPIED BY GRASS AND TREES AND IS LOOKED AFTER VERY WELL.
THERE ARE TWO PUBLIC HOUSES IN THE AREA. ONE BY THE VILLAGE GREEN WHICH IS RUN BY A MAN NAMED MARTIN PATCHING. THIS HOUSE IS NAMED 'THE RED LION'. MARTIN WAS ONCE A PLAYER IN WATFORD FOOTBALL TEAM. 'THE RED LION' HAS A NICE GARDEN WITH NICE FLOWERS. ONCE EVERY YEAR 'THE RED LION' HOLDS A BAR-B-QUE IN THE GARDEN.
THE SECOND PUBLIC HOUSE IS CALLED 'THE PLOUGH' AND IS NEAR TO THE VILLAGE GREEN. THIS IS THE OLDER OF THE TWO AND IS OWNED BY PETER DRAPER.
